comment: You are the best in AMO. Your lecture drive me to learn more in this field.
This subtitle is super bad. It even messed up Calorie with Kelvin, speed with spin, etc.
The last part about spin flipping is truly fascinating.

1:11:00 That explanation of ferromagnetism was amazing! Ferromagnetism comes mainly from the fermionic character of electrons, NOT from the magnetic moment of the electron! At least this applies to atoms with an even number of electrons..
Ironically, Kelvin and calories are both units of energy. Subtitles are merely a factor of 10^24 off.
